meanings.sent1: I stayed home coz it was raining outside.
meanings.sent2: She went to the store coz she needed groceries.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't go to the party coz he had to study for his test.
meanings.sent4: The cat meowed coz it wanted attention.
meanings.sent5: The tree swayed coz of the strong wind.

meanings.sent1: My coz is coming over for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: I have a lot of fun playing with my coz at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: My coz and I always get into mischief when we're together.
meanings.sent4: She is like a sister to me, not just a coz.
meanings.sent5: My coz has a contagious laugh that always makes me smile.
